title: [Client] Custom Item Sets Reverted to Ancient History
body:
**Description:** When I signed in today, all my newer custom item pages were missing, and ones I had deleted roughly a year ago were all of a sudden present.

**How to Reproduce:** I'm not sure exactly.  I just logged in.  I think today was the first day I signed in since launching Legends of Runeterra

Thank you to anyone who takes a look at / fixes this bug :D

replies.body: Exact same bug for me, item sets reverted several years back from what I can tell

The same thing happened to me yesterday.  

**Description:** I logged in and about half of my item sets were gone (all of the new ones), old ones that had been deleted were back and had to be deleted again, and my remaining item sets had reverted to how they were when I first built them instead of how they were the night prior.  In addition to this my key bindings were removed on many of my items in those sets; for example I set redemption to 3 and warding items to 2 and five and when I looked at my remaining item sets all of those bindings were gone and had to be redone.  

**How to Reproduce:** I'm not sure.  I've never launched Legends of Runeterra, I didn't play during the previous day although I was logged on as I was spectating my girlfriend's games all night.
Same thing here. Submitted a bug report.
